channel.title: AI on Onebite Dev
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Onebite Dev

item.title: You can ask AI, what is the output of the following code snippet ...
item.description: As a programmer, you may have come across a situation where you’re not sure what the output of a certain code snippet will be. TLDR Go to ChatGPT3 site and ask it something about your code! you’ll be suprised how detail the explanation is. Or you may try Github Copilot to get an AI suggestion on your text editor while you code. Why do you need it ? Maybe it’s code you’ve inherited from another developer, or maybe it’s code you wrote a while ago and have since forgotten how it works.
